// åŸºæœ¬ç±»å‹
let isDone: boolean = false
let decimal: number = 6
let color: string = "blue"
let list: number[] = [1, 2, 3]
let x: [string, number] = ["hello", 10] // å…ƒç»„

// æšä¸¾
enum Color {
  Red,
  Green,
  Blue
}
let c: Color = Color.Green

// any å’Œ unknown
let notSure: any = 4
notSure = "maybe a string"
notSure = false

let value: unknown = 4
// value.length // é”™è¯¯ï¼Œunknown éœ€è¦ç±»å‹æ£€æŸ¥

// void å’Œ never
function warnUser(): void {
  console.log("This is a warning message")
}

function error(message: string): never {
  throw new Error(message)
}

// æ¥å£å®šä¹‰
interface Person {
  name: string
  age: number
  readonly id: number // åªè¯»å±æ€§
  email?: string // å¯é€‰å±æ€§
  [key: string]: any // ç´¢å¼•ç­¾å
}

// ä½¿ç”¨æ¥å£
let user: Person = {
  name: "Alice",
  age: 30,
  id: 1
}

// ç±»å‹åˆ«å
type Point = {
  x: number
  y: number
}

type ID = string | number

// å‡½æ•°ç±»å‹
interface SearchFunc {
  (source: string, subString: string): boolean
}

let mySearch: SearchFunc = function(source: string, subString: string) {
  return source.search(subString) > -1
}

// åŸºç¡€æ¥å£
interface Shape {
  color: string
}

// æ‰©å±•æ¥å£
interface Square extends Shape {
  sideLength: number
}

let square: Square = {
  color: "blue",
  sideLength: 10
}

// å¤šé‡ç»§æ‰¿
interface PenStroke {
  penWidth: number
}

interface Circle extends Shape, PenStroke {
  radius: number
}

// ç±»å‹åˆ«å - å¯ä»¥è¡¨ç¤ºæ›´å¤æ‚çš„ç±»å‹
type Name = string
type NameResolver = () => string
type NameOrResolver = Name | NameResolver

function getName(n: NameOrResolver): Name {
  if (typeof n === "string") {
    return n
  } else {
    return n()
  }
}

// æ¥å£ - å¯ä»¥è¢«æ‰©å±•å’Œå®ç°
interface Animal {
  name: string
}

interface Dog extends Animal {
  breed: string
}

class GoldenRetriever implements Dog {
  name: string
  breed: string
  
  constructor(name: string) {
    this.name = name
    this.breed = "Golden Retriever"
  }
}

ğŸ”„ è”åˆç±»å‹ä¸äº¤å‰ç±»å‹ â€‹

è”åˆç±»å‹ (Union Types) â€‹

typescript
// åŸºæœ¬è”åˆç±»å‹
type StringOrNumber = string | number

function printId(id: StringOrNumber) {
  if (typeof id === "string") {
    console.log(id.toUpperCase())
  } else {
    console.log(id.toFixed(2))
  }
}

// å­—é¢é‡è”åˆç±»å‹
type Status = "loading" | "success" | "error"

function handleStatus(status: Status) {
  switch (status) {
    case "loading":
      console.log("æ­£åœ¨åŠ è½½...")
      break
    case "success":
      console.log("æ“ä½œæˆåŠŸ")
      break
    case "error":
      console.log("æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥")
      break
  }
}

// å¯è¾¨è¯†è”åˆç±»å‹
interface Circle {
  kind: "circle"
  radius: number
}

interface Square {
  kind: "square"
  sideLength: number
}

type Shape = Circle | Square

function getArea(shape: Shape): number {
  switch (shape.kind) {
    case "circle":
      return Math.PI * shape.radius ** 2
    case "square":
      return shape.sideLength ** 2
  }
}

äº¤å‰ç±»å‹ (Intersection Types) â€‹

typescript
// åŸºæœ¬äº¤å‰ç±»å‹
interface Person {
  name: string
}

interface Employee {
  id: number
  department: string
}

type EmployeePerson = Person & Employee

let employee: EmployeePerson = {
  name: "John",
  id: 123,
  department: "Engineering"
}

// æ³›å‹äº¤å‰ç±»å‹
type Identity<T> = T & { __type: "Identity" }

function identity<T>(arg: T): Identity<T> {
  return { ...arg, __type: "Identity" }
}

// æœ€ä½³é€šç”¨ç±»å‹
let zoo = [new Rhino(), new Elephant(), new Snake()]
// æ¨æ–­ä¸º (Rhino | Elephant | Snake)[]

// ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ¨æ–­
window.onmousedown = function(mouseEvent) {
  console.log(mouseEvent.button) // æ¨æ–­ä¸º MouseEvent
}

ç±»å‹å®ˆå« â€‹

typescript
// typeof ç±»å‹å®ˆå«
function padLeft(value: string, padding: string | number) {
  if (typeof padding === "number") {
    return Array(padding + 1).join(" ") + value
  }
  if (typeof padding === "string") {
    return padding + value
  }
  throw new Error(`Expected string or number, got '${padding}'.`)
}

// instanceof ç±»å‹å®ˆå«
class Bird {
  fly() {
    console.log("Bird is flying")
  }
}

class Fish {
  swim() {
    console.log("Fish is swimming")
  }
}

function move(animal: Bird | Fish) {
  if (animal instanceof Bird) {
    animal.fly()
  } else {
    animal.swim()
  }
}

// è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç±»å‹å®ˆå«
interface Cat {
  meow(): void
}

interface Dog {
  bark(): void
}

function isCat(animal: Cat | Dog): animal is Cat {
  return (animal as Cat).meow !== undefined
}

function makeSound(animal: Cat | Dog) {
  if (isCat(animal)) {
    animal.meow()
  } else {
    animal.bark()
  }
}

typescript
// åŸºæœ¬æ¡ä»¶ç±»å‹
type IsString<T> = T extends string ? true : false

type Test1 = IsString<string> // true
type Test2 = IsString<number> // false

// åˆ†å¸ƒå¼æ¡ä»¶ç±»å‹
type ToArray<T> = T extends any ? T[] : never

type StrArrayOrNumArray = ToArray<string | number> // string[] | number[]

// æ˜ å°„æ¡ä»¶ç±»å‹
type NonNullable<T> = T extends null | undefined ? never : T

type Test3 = NonNullable<string | null> // string

æ˜ å°„ç±»å‹ â€‹

typescript
// åŸºæœ¬æ˜ å°„ç±»å‹
type Readonly<T> = {
  readonly [P in keyof T]: T[P]
}

type Partial<T> = {
  [P in keyof T]?: T[P]
}

// è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ˜ å°„ç±»å‹
type Stringify<T> = {
  [K in keyof T]: string
}

interface Person {
  name: string
  age: number
}

type StringifiedPerson = Stringify<Person>
// { name: string; age: string; }

// æ¡ä»¶æ˜ å°„ç±»å‹
type Getters<T> = {
  [K in keyof T as `get${Capitalize<string & K>}`]: () => T[K]
}

interface User {
  id: number
  name: string
}

type UserGetters = Getters<User>
// { getId: () => number; getName: () => string; }

typescript
// åŸºæœ¬æ¨¡æ¿å­—é¢é‡ç±»å‹
type Greeting = `Hello, ${string}!`

const greeting: Greeting = "Hello, World!" // âœ…
// const invalid: Greeting = "Hi there!" // âŒ

// æ“ä½œæ¨¡æ¿å­—é¢é‡ç±»å‹
type AllCaps<T extends string> = Uppercase<T>
type LowerFirst<T extends string> = Uncapitalize<T>

type Result = AllCaps<"hello"> // "HELLO"

// ç»„åˆä½¿ç”¨
type EventName<T extends string> = `on${Capitalize<T>}`

type ButtonEvents = EventName<"click" | "hover">
// "onClick" | "onHover"

ç±»è£…é¥°å™¨ â€‹

typescript
// ç±»è£…é¥°å™¨
function sealed(constructor: Function) {
  Object.seal(constructor)
  Object.seal(constructor.prototype)
}

@sealed
class Greeter {
  greeting: string
  
  constructor(message: string) {
    this.greeting = message
  }
  
  greet() {
    return "Hello, " + this.greeting
  }
}

// å·¥å‚è£…é¥°å™¨
function classDecorator<T extends { new(...args: any[]): {} }>(constructor: T) {
  return class extends constructor {
    newProperty = "new property"
    hello = "override"
  }
}

@classDecorator
class Greeter2 {
  property = "original property"
  
  hello = "original"
}

console.log(new Greeter2())
